Sentencas: Samaria (Sm2O3) and samaria-doped ceria (SDC) films are electrochemically deposited on stainless steel in view of a potential use in solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of electrodeposited samaria and samaria-doped ceria thin films

Sentencas: As it is possible to deposit separately pure ceria (CeO2) and pure samaria (Sm2O3) in similar conditions, SDC films were successfully obtained in one electrochemical conditions set.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of electrodeposited samaria and samaria-doped ceria thin films

Sentencas: Thin films have been fabricated at low-temperature (30 degrees C) by applying a cathodic potential of -0.8 V/SCE, for 2 h. Structural and morphological properties of electrodeposited films have been studied by X-ray diffraction (XRD), scanning electron microscopy (SEM), techniques and Raman spectroscopy.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of electrodeposited samaria and samaria-doped ceria thin films

Sentencas: Special attention has been focused on the Raman spectroscopy study to emphasize the effect of heat treatment and samarium doping.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of electrodeposited samaria and samaria-doped ceria thin films

Sentencas: Despite cracks, single SDC phase was obtained crystallizing in a cubic symmetry.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of electrodeposited samaria and samaria-doped ceria thin films
